channel.title: Webclient Error
channel.description: My webclient loads up great but when it reaches "[B]Connecting to update serve[/B]r" it stays there for about 20 seconds and automatically redirects the page to a "[B]404 Page Not Found![/B]" page. And yes, server is running. Anyone know any solutions? thanks

item.title: Webclient Error
item.dc:creator: @desion desion
item.description:
@desion wrote:

My webclient loads up great but when it reaches “Connecting to update server” it stays there for about 20 seconds and automatically redirects the page to a “404 Page Not Found!” page. And yes, server is running. Anyone know any solutions? thanks

Read full topic
